programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.sub-title: Uncle Sphinx's Nose Job - Golden Jasmine Flower
programme.desc: Imagine being the odd one out because you look different. That's how Uncle Sphinx felt without a nose. The children set out to make him a nose so he'll fit in, but things didn't turn out the way Uncle Sphinx had hoped for. The children go in search of the Golden Jasmine Flower on Treasure Island. But Captain Redbeard really wants to get his hands on it first! Will he succeed?

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom
programme.desc: When Bartleby brings home some special Zazoony Moss, it suddenly starts to grow like crazy! It's now up to True to stop its spread before the moss covers the entire Rainbow Kingdom.

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Celebrity guests such as Misty Copeland, Terri, Bindi and Robert Irwin, Chrissy Teigen and Josh Gad appear in the latest season of Sesame Street.

programme.title: Kit n Kate
programme.desc: Two small kitties named Kit and Kate love their toy box. As soon as they hop inside, magic starts to happen. Kid's imagination transforms their room into a blueberry island, race track or a medieval castle. Every time the kitties create a whole new world with amazing discoveries, surprises and not-so-easy-to-solve dilemmas.

programme.title: Lil Wild
programme.desc: After a bump to the head Dil, who now has amnesia, has absentmindedly joined a group of urban pigeons and is now roaming the streets. With Wobi, Meep, and now Dil gone, Kokeko and Rara form an unlikely alliance with the pedantic cat, Mr. Tibbles, as they desperately try to search the city and find their lost friends.

programme.title: Lil Wild

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Join Peppa Pig and her family for more adorable adventures!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and maths.

programme.title: Kingdom Force
programme.desc: Kingdom Force follows the thrilling, fast-paced exploits of five mighty animal heroes as they serve and protect the citizens of five unique animal kingdoms. Led by the fearless wolf, Luka, this team has a carnivorous appetite for danger and thrills and there's no operation they can't pull off with the help of their giant rescue robot, Alpha-Mech. Whatever the problem, big or small, these heroes come together to work as one - Kingdom Force Unite!

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Food Trail
programme.desc: Exploring the traditional style of Cantonese specialties, Luke hikes to a Dim Sum house where he helps prepare some of their most popular dim sum, a Quail Egg Siu Mai, and Steamed Rice rolls with dried shrimp. Further out of the city, Luke explores Lantau Island, where he meets local Aunty Peng. She teaches him to cook a White Bean Congee with Steamed Pork neck with salted fish, fish egg and a salted duck egg out of her stilt house.

programme.title: Jamie's Quick And Easy Food
programme.desc: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food is the ultimate set of go-to recipes that are quick to cook and easy to remember. Perfect for those of you who love your grub, but don't have the time or energy for complicated cooking.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune
programme.desc: (Encore) Hosted by Pat Sajak, this game show features 3 contestants who try to solve a puzzle by spinning the wheel and guessing letters in a word or phrase.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Ah Hock acts out in desperation for Emily's attention, hurting Madeline in the process. Louis remains in denial about Zara's feelings for him. Derek attempts to guilt Charles into giving up his plans for revenge.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Ben and Vanessa receive the DNA results, confirming Ben is Grace's father. Vanessa gives Ben an ultimatum give up Gina or she'll move out with Grace. Salmah highlights to Li Yan about her pining for her late daughter on Grace.

programme.title: Body and Soul
programme.desc: Working from home - this is something we're all used to now. But what health issues could it present to us? Does it matter how we sit at our desks? What posture is the best? This episode of Body & Soul seeks to straighten things up.

programme.title: Best Furry Friends
programme.desc: The Best Furry Friends crew are made up of six girlfriends--Angelina, Cassandra, Kristin, Phoebe, Stephanie, Zoe--and their six furry fashionista side-kicks---Stardust (a pegacorn), Dash (a ginger cat), Cuddles (a white rabbit), DeeDee (a dragon), Sasha (a husky), and Zara (a sloth). Each BFF has their own personality and passions from science to singing to sports. When they are together with their #BFFSquad, no challenge is too great!

programme.title: Mondo Yan
programme.desc: The world has fallen into chaos and is now a stinky land of toxic cesspools and monstrous mutants, called the Chou World, run by the nasty villain Negu. High above, on top of ancient abandoned skyscrapers, a beautiful new yet fragile and harmonious world has risen: the Yan World. Protected by three eccentric Elders, three young apprentice misfits have been chosen to learn their secrets and protect this peaceful and idyllic place!

programme.title: Danger Mouse
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of secret agent Danger Mouse and his sidekick Penfold.

programme.title: MeteoHeroes
programme.desc: Fulmen, Nix, Nubes, Pluvia, Thermo and Ventum are six children who discover they have superpowers that involve weather phenomena. They also learn how they can use these to affect nature. Guided by CEM and the AI character Tempus they soon learn how to control their powers and use them wisely to solve small and big issues throughout our planet. On their way to becoming superheroes the kids will also face other dynamics that are typical of their age such as friendship, relations with elders etc.

programme.title: Winx Club - Eighth Series
programme.desc: During the night of the shooting stars, the Winx meet Twinkly, a Lumen coming from space. The Winx save her from mysterious creatures called Staryummies, which attack Alfea, and help her recover her memory. Twinkly remembers her mission and offers to lead the Winx on her star, Lumenia, to meet Dorana, queen of all the stars...

programme.title: Word Whiz
programme.desc: Dr Slime is back with more slime and a new and improved slime lab! Contestants will have to beat Dr Slime by solving the word puzzles, otherwise they'll get slimed and be stuck in his game forever as a minion!

programme.title: RenovAID
programme.desc: While work is underway to transform Irene's home into one more suited for a multi-generational family, presenter Oon Shu An takes her and her special-needs son Blaze on an outing and gets to experience part of a caregiver's struggles first-hand.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Madeline makes a painful decision about Ah Hock. Matthew meets up with Fiona and discovers useful evidence of Alan's criminal activities. Shen Yang agrees to help Ella expose Jessica's misdeeds.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce South East Asia
programme.desc: Singapore is a modern metropolis that may seem slightly authoritarian, but if you scrape below the surface, you can find the true grit of the locals. With so many people from so many different cultures, Singapore is truly a diverse place where you can find just about any kind of food and the opportunity for a better life, is available for all.

programme.title: Celebrity Family Feud
programme.desc: The classic Family Feud format has entertained a generation, and this hilarious celebrity reboot sees Emmy-award winning talk show host Steve Harley at the helm, as your favourite celebrities and their families play the game, thinking on their feet and trying to second guess the general public.

programme.title: Almari Ajaib
programme.desc: Almari Ajaib is a pre-teen info-educational programme where Malay folklore comes alive, immersing and engaging its viewers with an adrenaline-packed adventure. Its highly educational content is presented engagingly. The series is centered on 3 friends, Moni, Riz & Fendi, who stumble upon an old antique cupboard when they want to find out more about Moni & Riz's grandmother who has recently passed away. Their grandmother has been the storyteller who would weave captivating mythical stories and legends that will always keep them glued and in awe. They keep returning to the cupboard, drawn to the adventures that the cupboard holds. However, their adventures is laden with challenges, problems and pitfalls as the neighbourhood bully, Aris and other villains from the stories try to trap and stop them.

programme.title: Man vs Job
programme.desc: Driven by the passion of everyday people, the show will feature daily jobs that seem easy but are very challenging and demanding in reality. Rithvik Dhanjani, host of the show, will take up a new challenge in every episode, understand what it takes and beat against all odds to master the job. Man vs Job aims at giving the audience a chance to experience India's varied culture and learn about the not-so-famous occupations and the impact they have on our society. To get a better insight,.

programme.title: Lovebirds

programme.title: Ayalaan
programme.desc: Meet the M family! Mani, the wide-eyed father and Mages, his bossy wife, are aliens masquerading as humans on Earth, trying to comprehend and study human behavior. programme.title: Ethiroli
